name: Coffee Reflections
description:
It is the season promising new beginnings. As you recall your fondest holiday memories, don't forget your festive coffee fix.

An elegant set of green cappuccino cups are paired with our fruity yet strong Grand Reserve Coffee in the ARAKU Coffee Reflections Gift Box. Coming from our select coffee plots, Grand Reserve offers the ultimate balance between roundness and intensity, prized by coffee connoisseurs.

Please mention your preferred grind size for Grand Reserve in the order note.
